MAN.TITLE: addframe
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: Add a frame to the video file. (experimental)

PARAM_ITEM.PARAM_DESCRIPTION: The opened video file index, the return value of avifile.
The input image which must be UINT8 RGB image and the size must be the same as the argument dims of function avifile.

DESCRIPTION.P: addframe add a frame to video file n.
Video support for SIVP is only available when SIVP is compiled with OpenCV which support video I/O.

SECTION.label: Bugs and Shortcomings
SECTION.P: addframe does not check the size and date type of input image now.
